itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss all their picks for college rivalry week, they predict their final 4 in the College Playoffs, how SF Austin beat Duke in college hoops, why Masvidal might fight Mayweather in boxing, Ross finally apologizes to 49er...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss all their picks for college rivalry week, they predict their final 4 in the College Playoffs, how SF Austin beat Duke in college hoops, why Masvidal might fight Mayweather in boxing, Ross finally apologizes to 49ers fans, and they pick all the spreads for this week's NFL and College games.
